content: The singular case tonight hastens our union. You are mine! I've already told you and sworn it many times, now we will not say nor swear it anymore, now it must be so!
translations: ita:Il caso singolare di stasera affretta la nostra unione. Tu sei mia! Te l'ho già detto, e giurato, tante volte﹕ ora non l
credits: Sentence from Tatoeba by Opiejay888 (CC-BY 2.0 FR)
